person.persName: William A. Aikman (Laurel County, Kentucky, blacksmith)

body.p: Laurel County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to Martha A. Graves Aikman on November 6, 1854. Father of Alexander M. Aikman, Granville D. Aikman, and Sarah E. Aikman. Blacksmith in Laurel County in 1860.
